channel.title: Need Help
channel.description:
Was just wondering when I want to recolor an item say a whip. I want it to be purple, but I also still want to keep the old whip too. What would I put for the Id?4151, the orignal or a new id? and if it a new id how do i make it know which certain item?please and thanks
And if anyone could give me ids to galkons client base that would be apreciated

item.description:

U can use the original it wont change anything just search the colour code purple and change ur old colour and add the new one pretty easyâ€¦
